docs.title: Hello World!
docs.text:
The index.md in the /docs folder is the homepage you see here.

The folders in /docs appear as the main sections on the navigation bar.

The notes appear as pages within these sections. For example, Note 1 in Topic 1

[!multi-column]

[!tip] Work - [[Company Page]] - Meetings 

name Add meeting
type link
action shortcuts://run-shortcut?name=Create Meeting Minutes

[!Info] Personal - [[Info]] - [[Films]] - [[Books]] - [[Projects]]

[!multi-column]

[!blank-container]

docs.title: Backlog 🚧
docs.text:
TABLE WITHOUT ID link(file.link, title) AS "File",
   bar AS "Status" FROM #todo OR #backlog AND !#dailynote AND -"templates" SORT file.ctime LIMIT 10

[!blank-container]

docs.title: Recently Created 🐣
docs.text:
TABLE WITHOUT ID link(file.link, title) as "File", length(file.inlinks) AS "Mentions"
 FROM "" SORT file.ctime DESC LIMIT 10

[!blank-container]

docs.title: Review ⬅️
docs.text: TABLE WITHOUT ID link(file.link, title) AS "File", sr-due as "Due" FROM #review WHERE sr-due <= date(today) SORT sr-due LIMIT 10

docs.title: LaTeX Math Support
docs.text:
LaTeX math is supported using MathJax.

Inline math looks like \(f(x) = x^2\). The input for this is $f(x) = x^2$. Use $...$.

For a block of math, use $$...$$ on separate lines

$$
F(x) = \int^a_b \frac{1}{2}x^4
$$

gives

\[ F(x) = \int^a_b \frac{1}{2}x^4 \]

docs.title: Mermaid diagrams
docs.text:
Here's the example from MkDocs Material documentation: 

graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Error?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Hmm...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Yay!];

docs.title: Text Formatting
docs.text:
You can have lists like this

  • first
  • second
  • third

Or checklist lists to

  • Get
  • things
  • done

Also, get highlights and strikethroughs as above (similar to Obsidian).

More formatting options for your webpage here. (but not compatible with Obsidian)

docs.title: Se familiariser avec l'impression 3D
docs.text: Afin de se familiariser avec l'impression 3D et le fonctionnement des imprimantes, j'ai proceder selon ce etapes : 1. #Création d'un objet Fusion360 2. #Telecharger un objet sur https //www.printables.com 3. #Utiliser le slicer 4. #Prise en main d'utilisation de l'imprimante 5. #Resultat de l'impression

docs.title: Prise en main d'utilisation de l'imprimante
